featured.text: Residents are told not to dump all household waste _____ into the trash can; reusable materials should first be sorted out and recycled.
According to one research, 90% of the bottles used are not recycled and lie for ages in landfills.

definition.zh_def: 回收再利用，將廢棄物轉換為可重複使用的材料或產品。
definition.en_def: To process used materials to make them suitable for reuse.
definition.example: We should recycle paper to reduce waste and save trees.
